Title: Increases certain penalties for violating the prohibition of animal fighting and for aggravated cruelty to animals
Summary: Increases certain penalties for violating the prohibition of animal fighting and for aggravated cruelty to animals; requires a psychiatric evaluation for defendants convicted of aggravated cruelty to animals.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to increasing certain penalties for violating the prohibition of animal fighting and for aggravated cruelty to animals
